provisions.content:
2. The First Schedule to the Constitution is amended-
Schedule to
the Con-              (a) by deleting the Oath of Allegiance and substituting
stitution.                therefor the following-
                            "               Oath of Allegiance
                                 I,                                , do swear that I
                                 will be faithful and bear true allegiance to
                                 Jamaica, that I will uphold and defend the Con-
                                 stitution and the laws of Jamaica and that I will
                                 conscientiously and impartially discharge my
                                 responsibilities to the people of Jamaica. So help
                                 me God.";
                       (b)   by deleting the Judicial Oath and substituting there-
                             for the following-
                                 "                         Judicial Oath
                                 I,                                  , do swear that I
                                 will be faithful and bear true allegiance to
                                 Jamaica, that I will uphold and defend the Con-
                                 stitution of Jamaica and that I will administer
                                 justice to all persons alike in accordance with the
                                 laws and usages of Jamaica without fear or
                                 favour, affection or ill will. So help me God.".
